item.description:
Lets go to the New Years Eve Comedy Show at the Brewery Exchange. There will be a buffet at 7 PM and a comedy show at 8 PM featuring Tim McIntire (Comedy Central), Dave Rattigan (XM, Sirius), and three other good comedians -- Dan Lee, Dan Gill and Sam Rodriguez -- to be followed by DJ dancing/billiards/etc. after the show.

http://www.scampscome...

Tickets by phone at 877-548-3237
[Monday-Friday, 9:00am-7:00pm EST]

Event information at 978-828-9532.

Directions:
http://www.thebrewery...

Cost:
$15.00

Get Your Ticket Here:

http://www.ticketfusi...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: New Years Eve Comedy & More @ Brewery Exchange
